thread.title: Big Ten tournament scores, bracket, schedule, live blog: Wisconsin beats Indiana
thread.title_full: Big Ten tournament scores, bracket, schedule, live blog: Wisconsin beats Indiana

author: CBS Sports Staff
title: Big Ten tournament scores, bracket, schedule, live blog: Wisconsin beats Indiana
text:
Big Ten tournament scores, bracket, schedule, live blog: Wisconsin beats Indiana Wisconsin advanced to the semifinal with a win over Indiana by CBS Sports Staff 1m ago • 1 min read 
Download the CBS Sports App today and get instant tournament news and alerts, plus play Brackets ! 
Wisconsin, the No. 2 seed in the tournament, took care of business against Indiana to earn a trip to the semifinals of the Big Ten Tournament. The Badgers will meet the winner of Maryland and Northwestern. 
On Thursday afternoon, Michigan, which didn’t even have its game uniforms, won convincingly over Illinois and all but sealed the Illini’s fate as a NIT team. Michigan State also won in conving fashion over Penn State. 
Friday was again the day of the Michigan Wolverines, as they rolled to an overtime win over No. 1 seed Purdue -- the second consecutive year it has knocked off the top seed in the Big Ten Tournament. 
(Don’t miss out on brackets! Sign up now to play against friends and to compete to win prizes during each round.) 
If the regular season is any indicator of the postseason, we should be in for quite a tournament. Indiana, once considered a favorite, finished below the top half of the league. Then Wisconsin, which started red-hot, eventually fell flat down the stretch. It’s been a wildly unpredictable regular season, so why should the Big Ten Tournament be any different?
